name: Atmos Self Yeeting Assault
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
Thank you for upgrading Warbeard's Slammin' Flammin' Kablammin' War Supplies' most risky investment, yet!
-
Ready to get up in people's personal space so quickly they don't have enough time to respectfully ask you to back off? Perfect! Let's get started! Since you seemed to have survived being yeeted into a tree, the rest of this is pretty self explanatory.
**Stop practicing on trees, you're going to hurt them!**
Next time you are yeeting thyself into an entity that intends to harm you, instead of hitting the creature with your face, try sticking your sword out with your other hand and praying to your gods you hit it. That's all there is to it! None of our engineers have developed a better way to do this. The only ones who got even close eventually received permanent injuries. 
On a completely unrelated note, we are hiring test subjects to try out our new line of *Pocket Ziplines*! Tell your friends!*
-
-
Targets Single creature you are considered Connected with.
Requirements The path between your target and yourself is clear. Your target must be one or more sizes larger than you. 
Effect You are forcefully moved to the square adjacent to your target on the same side that this move started. You make attempt a melee Strike on the target. If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll as well as gain an additional damage die on this Strike's damage. This additional damage die is also doubled on a critical hit. 
-
*Please tell your friends.
